channel.title: Arjun on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in Arjun on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: Nadiye Nadiye Kadhal Nadiye: Lyrics and Translation
item.description: The movie Rhythm has themed songs on the various elements of nature. This one is on water. The lyrics draw a comparisons between the qualities of women and and of water.

item.title: En Veetu Thotathil: Lyrics and Translation
item.description: This sweet love song from the movie Gentleman in the 1990s is one of A.R. Rahmanâ€™s lesser known gems. It has a fresh, innocent, morning feel to it even though the lyrics are more explicit than many other Tamil songs of that time.
